name: pretty-package
description: Generates a Markdown file or snippet from a `package.json` file.

scripts.md: echo '<link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet"><body class="container">' > test.html; python -m markdown test.md >> test.html; echo '</body>' >> test.html

author: geoffdavis92
